column4: I am not getting any sound but lspci shows: 00:10.1 Audio device: nVidia Corporation MCP51 High Definition Audio (rev a2)
any idea why I can't hear sound?  This worked before upgrading to 10.04
yes it launched on the install
is your s-card shown correctly in it's tilebar ?
The card is showing up as PulseAudio - I have a Nvidia
nah, pulse acts as a sound-proxy, and not as a s-card;  are the channels unmuted ?
on the mixer it shows green with little speakers
The bar is about 3/4 up on both channels
so need some more debugging then, follow :
thanks - I will take a look
least I know card is supported, if it all fails, install latest alsa from source
as said, works with ubuntu, minor issue
